dkeep.logic.levels

Class KeepLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.levels.Level
      • dkeep.logic.levels.KeepLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class KeepLevel
extends Level
implements java.io.Serializable
    The second level of the dungeon, the one with ogres.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
